original_title: 秋 アントニオ・ヴィヴァルディ「四季」より
overview: Dear Mr. Vivaldi, I apologise for setting your music to animation without your permission. But I wanted to depict “autumn” in my own way with various animals. Thank you for understanding. Yours sincerely, AW.
title: Autumn from Antonio Vivaldi “The Four Seasons”
